Sentencas: Magnesia-doped lanthanum chromite is a potential material for use in solid oxide fuel cells as an interconnector due to its resistance to oxidation and reduction.
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE

Sentencas: The strength and toughness of La(Cr0.9Mg0.1)O-3 were measured from 25 degrees to 1000 degrees C in the as-fired reduced state and after oxidation.
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE

Sentencas: The as-fired samples showed a peak in toughness of approximately 3.9 MPa .
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE
MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE

Sentencas: at 125 degrees C which decreased to approximately 1.4 MPa .
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE

Sentencas: m(1/2) at 600 degrees C and 2.8 MPa .
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE
MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE

Sentencas: This peak in toughness is hypothesized to be due to the rhombohedral-to-orthorhombic phase transition by a toughening mechanism that is currently being investigated.
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE

Sentencas: The strength was also affected by the phase transition for both the as-fired reduced and the oxidized samples.
Titulo: MECHANICAL-PROPERTIES OF MAGNESIA-DOPED LANTHANUM CHROMITE VERSUS TEMPERATURE
